contentrichtext.text: '''Edward Plantagenet''' may refer to: *[[Edward I of England]] (1239-1307), popularly known as Longshanks, reigned from 1272 until his death *[[Edward II of England]] (1284-1327), reigned from 1307 until he was deposed in January 1327, and was murdered in September *[[Edward III of England]] (1312-1377), crowned at the age of 14, and was one of the more successful English monarchs of the Middle Ages *[[Edward IV of England]] (1442-1483), reigned from 1461 to 1470, and again from 1471 *[[Edward V of England]] (1470-1483), king for two months in 1483 until deposed and sent to the Tower *[[Edward of Middleham, Prince of Wales]] (1473-1484), only son of King Richard III of England *[[Edward of Westminster, Prince of Wales]] (1453-1471), son of King Henry VI *[[Edward, the Black Prince]] (1330-1376), son of Edward III, known during his lifetime as Edward of Woodstock *[[Edward Plantagenet, 17th Earl of Warwick]] (1475â€“1499), son of George Plantagenet, 1st Duke of Clarence, himself son of Richard Plantagenet, 3rd Duke of York {{hndis|Planagenet, Edward}}
